      • placeDiceUnrestricted

        public void placeDiceUnrestricted(Dice dice,
                                  Position position)
        Place the dice in the given position without any restriction. If the position is already occupied, the dice gets replaced.
        Parameters:
        dice - dice to place
        position - position where place the dice

      • isPositionValid

        public boolean isPositionValid(Position curPosition,
                               Position newPosition)
        return if the position is valid when moving a dice according to the WindowsPattern and ToolCard rules
        Parameters:
        curPosition - the position of the dice that should be moved
        newPosition - the final position of the dice to be moved
        Returns:
        whether the position is valid or not

      • isPositionValid

        public boolean isPositionValid(Dice dice,
                               Position position,
                               ToolCard toolCard)
        return if the position is valid according to the WindowsPattern and ToolCard rules
        Parameters:
        dice - to verify position
        position - to verify
        toolCard - placement rules
        Returns:
        false - unvalid position, true - valid position
